title: Pshav-Khevsureti National Park
about: Pshav-Khevsureti National Park- is situated in the municipality of Dusheti, in one of the most beautiful sides of Georgia, in Pshav-Khevsureti. It has its unique nature, and surroundings, as well as the location, which delights the visitors. In this “corner” of Georgia, there are plenty of sightings and historical or cultural monuments. Pshav-Khevsureti is one of the most known and popular touristic regions of Georgia, with peerless traditions and cuisine.
